deploy.startCommand: composer dump-autoload --optimize; php artisan package:discover --ansi; php artisan config:cache; php artisan route:cache; php artisan view:cache; php artisan migrate --force; sed -i "s/PORT_PLACEHOLDER/$PORT/g" /etc/apache2/sites-available/000-default.conf; echo "Listen $PORT" > /etc/apache2/ports.conf; apache2-foreground
